diagrams.code:
direction right
// Long Context Theorem Proving Architecture

// Nodes and groups
Proof Goal Input [shape: oval, icon: file-text, color: lightblue]
Lemma Repository [shape: parallelogram, icon: database, color: lightgray]

Initialize Proof State with Large Context Window [shape: rectangle, icon: layers, color: lightblue]

Proof Loop [color: lightgray] {
  Retrieve Relevant Definitions and Lemmas [shape: rectangle, icon: book-open, color: lightgreen]
  Encode Context with Attention Mechanisms [shape: rectangle, icon: cpu, color: lightyellow]
  Predict Next Tactic Using Full Context [shape: rectangle, icon: zap, color: orange]
  Apply Predicted Tactic [shape: rectangle, icon: play, color: orange]
  Update Proof State [shape: rectangle, icon: refresh, color: lightblue]
  Proof Completed? [shape: diamond, icon: check-circle, color: purple]
}

Final Proof Result [shape: oval, icon: check-circle, color: lightgreen]

// Relationships
Proof Goal Input > Initialize Proof State with Large Context Window
Lemma Repository > Retrieve Relevant Definitions and Lemmas

Initialize Proof State with Large Context Window > Encode Context with Attention Mechanisms
Retrieve Relevant Definitions and Lemmas > Encode Context with Attention Mechanisms

Encode Context with Attention Mechanisms > Predict Next Tactic Using Full Context
Predict Next Tactic Using Full Context > Apply Predicted Tactic
Apply Predicted Tactic > Update Proof State
Update Proof State > Proof Completed?
Proof Completed? > Final Proof Result: Yes [color: green]
Retrieve Relevant Definitions and Lemmas < Proof Completed?: No
